text: The Mengjiang United Autonomous Government () was a puppet state of the Japanese Empire. It was located in Inner Mongolia, and its capital was Kalgan. It existed from 1939 to 1945. Its ruler was Demchugdongrub. == References == Category:Former countries in Asia Category:1939 establishments in Asia Category:1945 disestablishments in Asia Category:20th century in Japan Category:20th century in China Category:20th century in Mongolia Category:Puppet states Category:Former dictatorships
title: Mengjiang United Autonomous Government
